channel.title: Posts on Hi I'm Brandon
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hi I'm Brandon

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello world, I am starting my first step into posting on this webpage. I’m hoping to share learnings on engineering ideas ranging from code to system design using this platform on a weekly basis. I figured that posting like this would keep myself accountable for my own growth and internalise concepts better. I suppose another good side effect would be racking my brain to desseminate information in a logical and coherent way (it’s been too long).
